meanings.definition: A type of climbing perch fish found in Asia.
meanings.sent1: The anabas swam gracefully in the clear waters of the pond.
meanings.sent2: I saw an anabas at the aquarium during my visit.
meanings.sent3: The anabas tried to climb a tree, thinking it was a fish ladder.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to reach the top was like that of an anabas scaling a waterfall.
meanings.sent5: The anabas's ability to breathe air and move on land amazed the onlookers.

meanings.definition: The act of climbing or ascending.
meanings.sent1: The anabas of the hikers up the steep mountain was slow but steady.
meanings.sent2: The anabas of the airplane before takeoff was thrilling.
meanings.sent3: The anabas of the squirrel up the tree was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent4: Her career had an anabas, starting from an intern to a CEO.
meanings.sent5: The anabas of the hot air balloon into the sky was breathtaking.
